Instruction: Combine flour, 1 tablespoon sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl. Whisk together milk, butter, eggs, and vanilla extract until the mixture is smooth.
Cook crêpes in a skillet over medium-high heat in batches until lightly browned on both sides, about 2 minutes per side. Transfer each cooked crêpe to a plate and repeat with remaining batter.
Spread a mixture of coconut, 1 tablespoon sugar, and cardamom onto the center of each crepe. Fold the crepe over the filling, either enveloping it or folding it in half.
